message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  I believe it would be incredibly valuable to your endeavors, and I'm confident you'll agree. I'm asking for $950,000. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $750,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is possible.

Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, but $750,000 is significantly below its true value.  This product can truly revolutionize your operations. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the substantial benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on the product, I still need to keep my expenses low. I am willing to pay $800,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
